channel.title: Door question

item.title: Door question
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

think im getting it now and the last question

if [b](absY == 3120)[/b] { <- if statement teleportToX = 2373; <- teliport teleportToY = 3119; <- teliport } <- close bracket if ([b]absY == 3119[/b]) { <- if statement teleportToX = 2373; <- teliport teleportToY = 3120; <-teliport

what do these 2 numbers mean??, how do u set where this door is??
also where do u put this code?

item.title: Door question
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

if (objectID == 4427 && (objectX == 2373) && (objectY == 3119)) <- door id
// Zamorak large door 1 <- programming notes
{ <- open bracket
if (absY == 3120) { <- if statement
teleportToX = 2373; <- teliport
teleportToY = 3119; <- teliport
} <- close bracket
if (absY == 3119) { <- if statement
teleportToX = 2373; <- teliport
teleportToY = 3120; <-teliport
}close bracket
}close bracket

Read full topic

@silabsoft wrote:

well thats the code you would have to use… if (objectID == 4427 && (objectX == 2373) && (objectY == 3119)) // Zamorak large door 1 { if (absY == 3120) { teleportToX = 2373; teleportToY = 3119; } if (absY == 3119) { teleportToX = 2373; teleportToY = 3120; } }

thats a single door command you can change it to fix the glitchy doors but if your looking to leech im sorry but noone has givin out the code yet for all fix doors however someone at whitescape.net has started

item.title: Door question
item.dc:creator: @Sells Sells
item.description:
@Sells wrote:

here you have my castlewars its a part of your question

[sup][/sup]
// Zamorak staircase 2 (up)
{
if (absX == 2379) {
teleportToX = 2380;
teleportToY = 3130;
heightLevel = 0;
}
if (absX == 2380) {
teleportToX = 2379;
teleportToY = 3127;
heightLevel = 1;
}
}

if (objectID == 4415 && (objectX == 2380) && (objectY == 3127))
// Zamorak staircase 2 (down)
{
if (absX == 2380) {
teleportToX = 2379;
teleportToY = 3127;
heightLevel = 1;
}
if (absX == 2379) {
teleportToX = 2380;
teleportToY = 3130;
heightLevel = 0;
}
}

if (objectID == 4418 && (objectX == 2369) && (objectY == 3126))
// Zamorak staircase 3 (up)
{
if (absY == 3127) {
teleportToX = 2372;
teleportToY = 3126;
heightLevel = 1;
}
if (absY == 3126) {
teleportToX = 2369;
teleportToY = 3127;
heightLevel = 2;
}
}

if (objectID == 4415 && (objectX == 2369) && (objectY == 3126))
// Zamorak staircase 3 (down)
{
if (absY == 3126) {
teleportToX = 2369;
teleportToY = 3127;
heightLevel = 2;
}
if (absY == 3127) {
teleportToX = 2372;
teleportToY = 3126;
heightLevel = 1;
}
}

if (objectID == 4418 && (objectX == 2374) && (objectY == 3131))
// Zamorak staircase 4 (up)
{
if (absX == 2373) {
teleportToX = 2374;
teleportToY = 3130;
heightLevel = 2;
}
if (absX == 2374) {
teleportToX = 2373;
teleportToY = 3133;
heightLevel = 3;
}
}

if (objectID == 4415 && (objectX == 2374) && (objectY == 3133))
// Zamorak staircase 4 (down)
{
if (absX == 2374) {
teleportToX = 2373;
teleportToY = 3133;
heightLevel = 3;
}
if (absX == 2373) {
teleportToX = 2374;
teleportToY = 3130;
heightLevel = 2;
}
}
if (objectID == 4388 && (objectX == 2436) && (objectY == 3082) && playerLevel[8] >= 85)
{
teleportToX = 2834;
teleportToY = 3269;
addItem(2414,1);
addItem(2657,1);
addItem(2659,1);
addItem(2655,1);
addItem(2653,1);
addItem(2417,1);
addItem(995,1000);
sendMessage(“You Teleport to Crandor island. you get some Zamorak Armor and 1,000 coins!”);
addSkillXP((1250*playerLevel[6]), 6);
heightLevel = 0;
}
else if (objectID == 4388 && (objectX == 2436) && (objectY == 3082) && playerLevel[8] < 85)
{
sendMessage(“You need atleast level 85 magic to use this God Portal!”);
}

if (objectID == 4387 && (objectX == 2436) && (objectY == 3096) && playerLevel[8] >= 85)
{
teleportToX = 3058;
teleportToY = 3885;
addItem(2412,1);
addItem(2665,1);
addItem(2667,1);
addItem(2663,1);
addItem(2661,1);
addItem(2415,1);
addItem(1275,1);
addItem(995,1050);
sendMessage(“You Teleport to the Rune Rocks! You get some Saradomin armor and 1,050 coins!”);
sendMessage(“Here is your Rune pick if you want to mine some runite!!”);
addSkillXP((1250playerLevel[6]), 6);
addSkillXP((1250playerLevel[14]), 14);
heightLevel = 1;
}
else if (objectID == 4387 && (objectX == 2436) && (objectY == 3096) && playerLevel[8] < 85)
{
sendMessage(“You need atleast level 85 magic to use this God Portal!”);
}

if (objectID == 4408 && (objectX == 2436) && (objectY == 3089) && playerLevel[8] >= 85)
{
teleportToX = 5600;
teleportToY = 5000;
addItem(2413,1);
addItem(2673,1);
addItem(2675,1);
addItem(2671,1);
addItem(2669,1);
addItem(2416,1);
addItem(995,2000);
sendMessage(“You Teleport to the middle of nowhere land!”);
sendMessage(“you also get some guthix armour and 2,000 coins!”);
heightLevel = 0;
}
else if (objectID == 4408 && (objectX == 2436) && (objectY == 3089) && playerLevel[8] < 85)
{
sendMessage(“You need atleast level 85 magic to use this God Portal!”);
}

if (objectID == 4427 && (objectX == 2373) && (objectY == 3119))
// Zamorak large door 1
{
if (absY == 3120) {
teleportToX = 2373;
teleportToY = 3119;
}
if (absY == 3119) {
teleportToX = 2373;
teleportToY = 3120;
}
}

if (objectID == 4428 && (objectX == 2372) && (objectY == 3119))
// Zamorak large door 1
{
if (absY == 3120) {
teleportToX = 2372;
teleportToY = 3119;
}
if (absY == 3119) {
teleportToX = 2372;
teleportToY = 3120;
}
}
if (objectID == 4467 && (objectX == 2384) && (objectY == 3134))
// Zamorak door 2
{
if (absX == 2384) {
teleportToX = 2385;
teleportToY = 3134;
}
if (absX == 2385) {
teleportToX = 2384;
teleportToY = 3134;
}
}

if (objectID == 4470 && (objectX == 2377) && (objectY == 3131))
// Zamorak Energy barrier 1
{
if (absX == 2376) {
teleportToX = 2377;
teleportToY = 3131;
}
if (absX == 2377) {
teleportToX = 2376;
teleportToY = 3131;
}
}

if (objectID == 4470 && (objectX == 2373) && (objectY == 3126))
// Zamorak Energy barrier 2
{
if (absY == 3127) {
teleportToX = 2373;
teleportToY = 3126;
}
if (absY == 3126) {
teleportToX = 2373;
teleportToY = 3127;
}
}

//tables codes-------------------------------tables codes

if ((objectID == 4458) && (objectX == 2376) && (objectY == 3128) && playerLevel[7] >= 0)
{
addItem(380, 5);
//sendMessage (“You take some lobsters!”);
}
else if ((objectID == 4458) && (objectX == 2376) && (objectY == 3128) && playerLevel[7] < 0)
{
sendMessage(“You need atleast level 55 cooking to take these lobsters!”);
}

if ((objectID == 4464) && (objectX == 2376) && (objectY == 3133)) //Zamorak pickaxes
{
addItem(1265, 1);
//sendMessage (“You take the Pickaxe.”);
}

if ((objectID == 4460) && (objectX == 2376) && (objectY == 3131) && playerLevel[17] >= 0)
{
addItem(4835, 155);
sendMessage (“You take some ourg bones.”);
}
else if ((objectID == 4460) && (objectX == 2376) && (objectY == 3131) && playerLevel[17] < 0)
{
sendMessage(“You need atleast level 65 thieving to take these bones!”);
}

if ((objectID == 4463) && (objectX == 2373) && (objectY == 3131)) //Zamorak Exploding potions
{
addItem(4045, 1);
//sendMessage (“You take the Exploding potion.”);
}

if ((objectID == 4462) && (objectX == 2373) && (objectY == 3133)) //Zamorak Ropes
{
addItem(954, 1);
//sendMessage (“You take the Rope.”);
}

if ((objectID == 4459) && (objectX == 2370) && (objectY == 3131)) //Zamorak Toolbox
{
addItem(4051, 1);
//sendMessage (“You take the Toolbox.”);
}

if ((objectID == 4461) && (objectX == 2370) && (objectY == 3133) && playerLevel[17] >= 0)
{
addItem(4516, 1);
addItem(4515, 1);
sendMessage(“You take the Zamorak hood and cape!”);
}
else if ((objectID == 4461) && (objectX == 2370) && (objectY == 3133) && playerLevel[17] < 0)
{
sendMessage(“You need atleast level 25 thieving to take this castle wars armour!”);
}

//tables codes-------------------------------tables codes

//Saradomin----------Saradomin----------Saradomin

if (objectID == 4417 && (objectX == 2419) && (objectY == 3078))
// Saradomin staircase 2 (up)
{
if (absX == 2420) {
teleportToX = 2419;
teleportToY = 3077;
heightLevel = 0;
}
if (absX == 2419) {
teleportToX = 2420;
teleportToY = 3080;
heightLevel = 1;
}
}

if (objectID == 4415 && (objectX == 2419) && (objectY == 3080))
// Saradomin staircase 2 (down)
{

teleportToY = 3080;
heightLevel = 1;
}

}
